mapper.select: SELECT C.USER_ID, C.USER_NAME, C.MOBILE, TO_CHAR(C.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DATE FROM TB_USER C ORDER BY C.USER_ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) TOTAL FROM TB_USER C ORDER BY C.USER_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TEST0829 SET COL2='11' WHERE COL1 = 1
mapper.select: SELECT TEU.ENT_USER_ID, TEU.MOBILE, TEU.CREATE_DATE, TEU.USER_STATUS, TEU.IMEI, TEU.IMSI, TEU.USER_NAME, TEU.MANUFACTURER, TEU.MODEL, TEU.RELEASE, TEU.TXL_VERSION, 0 AS UPDATE_TIMES, DECODE(TEU.LOGIN_PWD, NULL, '邀请加入通信录', '提醒更新通信录') AS OPERATOR_NAME, DECODE(TEU.LOGIN_PWD, NULL, '0', '1') AS OPERATOR_TYPE, FUNC_GROUP_NAME_FIRST(TEU.MOBILE) GROUP_NAME_FIRST FROM TB_ENT_USER TEU WHERE TEU.ENT_ID = 713 AND TEU.USER_STATUS = 0
